summary: Modders Resource. 20+ Cubemaps made by Humus converted to work in Skyrim, with 3 levels of blur.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=4][u]
Humus Cubemaps for Skyrim[/u][/size]
Converted by Billyro[/center]


[u]Description[/u]

This is a [i][color=#d9ead3]modder's resource[/color][/i] for Skyrim: 20+ cubemaps made by Humus, converted to the correct format for use in Skyrim. There are 3 levels of blur for use with various surfaces. There are multiple environments, including green forests, fall forests, grasslands, snowscapes, mountains, interiors, and more.

You can check out more of Humus' cubemaps at his website: [url=http://www.humus.name/]http://www.humus.name/[/url]
Humus' cubemaps are provided under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported License: [url=https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/]https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/[/url]



[u]Permissions[/u]

Humus is the original creator of the cubemaps. I simply converted them for use in Skyrim. They are free for use in any mod, as per Humus' license. 

You MUST give credit to Humus if you use any of these cubemaps in your mod. 



[u]Changelog[/u]

v1: Initial release



[u]Tools Used[/u]

ATI CubeMapGen
Paint.NET
3DS Max
Nifskope
author: Humus
